title: # 417 - Jay Pharoah & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with SNL Alum Jay Pharoah. we talk about getting SNL, starting standup at 16, ciders, impersonations, getting wrongfully detained and much more! 

Jay has a new movie “2 Minutes of Fame” out now on demand at Amazon Video & iTunes. 

This episode is brought to you by Buffalo Trace whiskey. Go to http://www.Buffalotrace.com to order yours today.

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at http://www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out http://www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon Earbuds. Get 15% off your order at http://www.buyraycon.com/Bertcast 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
